Author: Caketryahaim
Text: Seconding this.   Even at my lowest weight, when my face was very gaunt, the moment I ate a substantial amount of calories, it would fill out.

Author: speakofthewolf
Text: If you're restricting pretty heavily you might look more gaunt than you would otherwise. For me, when I restrict below 1000 for a while my face gets all shadow-y but as as I eat at 1000-1200 for a week I look brighter and less gaunt even though my weight may be lower or the same.
